itemLabel: Nicholas Lyell, Baron Lyell of Markyate
itemDescription: English politician and life peer. Solicitor-General and Attorney General for England and Wales (1938-2010)

wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Walter Lyell, Baron Lyell of Markyate, PC, QC (6 December 1938 – 30 August 2010) was an English Conservative politician, known for much of his active political career as Sir Nicholas Lyell.

response: He was the father of Nicholas Lyell, Baron Lyell of Markyate, Attorney-General from 1992 to 1997.
**Nicholas Lyell, Baron Lyell of Markyate, politician and life peer (b. 1938)
